articles.description: Ange Postecoglou says Tottenham lacked "belief and conviction" as their Champions League hopes were hit by defeat at Chelsea.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Spurs lacked belief and conviction at Chelsea

articles.description: Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen claim a 2-0 first-leg victory at Roma to take command of their Europa League semi-final and stretch their unbeaten run to 47 matches.
articles.title: Leverkusen in command of Europa League semi with Roma

articles.description: Aston Villa's hopes of reaching the Europa Conference League final were dealt a major blow by a chaotic semi-final first-leg defeat to Olympiakos.
articles.title: Villa face battle to reach Conference League final

articles.description: Newcastle midfielder Sandro Tonali is given a suspended two-month ban by the Football Association after admitting breaches of betting rules.
articles.title: Sandro Tonali: Newcastle player gets suspended two-month FA betting ban

articles.description: West Indies international Devon Thomas is banned from cricket for five years after admitting seven anti-corruption breaches.
articles.title: West Indies' Devon Thomas banned five years for match-fixing
O'Sullivan casts doubt on UK appearances next season

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says it would be a “privilege to work with” Adrian Newey if the designer joins Ferrari following his departure from Red Bull.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton says working with Adrian Newey at Ferrari 'would be a privilege'

articles.description: World number one Iga Swiatek cruises into her second straight Madrid Open final where she will face either Aryna Sabalenka or Elena Rybakina.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Iga Swiatek beats Madison Keys to reach final again

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler secures his place in the Premier League play-offs with a 6-4 win over Rob Cross in Aberdeen.
articles.title: Luke Littler seals Premier League Darts play-off spot with Aberdeen win

articles.description: Former Bolton Wanderers footballer Fabrice Muamba, Luton Town's Tom Lockyer and Wigan Athletic's Charlie Wyke share how CPR saved their lives following on-pitch cardiac arrests.
articles.title: Cardiac arrests: Fabrice Muamba, Tom Lockyer and Charlie Wyke call for more CPR training
